export.name: Enhanced Resource Display
export.description: Customizable resource bar with class-specific tracking for mana, energy, rage, and more
export.setupInstructions:
1. Install Sensei Resource Bar from CurseForge
2. Type `/sensei` in-game to open configuration
3. Click 'Import Profile' in the settings menu
4. Paste the export string provided above
5. Adjust position and scale to your preference
6. Click 'Save' to apply the configuration
